description: Detects python spawning a pretty tty which could be indicative of potential reverse shell activity
author: Nextron Systems
name: Python Spawning Pretty TTY
query: (((process.executable.text:("*\/python" OR "*\/python2" OR "*\/python3")) OR (process.executable.text:("*\/python2.*" OR "*\/python3.*"))) AND (((process.command_line.text:"*import\ pty*" AND process.command_line.text:"*.spawn\(*")) OR (process.command_line.text:"*from\ pty\ import\ spawn*")))
